fraudawarenes_line: E-PAYCIO, siyazithathela izinto eziza kuqala kukho konke okunye.
fraudawarenes_answer1: Ukuhlala unolwazi ngezinhlelo ezijwayelekile zokukhwabanisa nokuthi ungazigwema kanjani, kwenze umkhuba ukuvakashela izinsizakusebenza zethu zemfundo kwiwebhusayithi njalo.
fraudawarenes_answer2: Vula ukuqinisekiswa kwezici ezimbili (2FA) ukuphepha ngokwengeziwe.
fraudawarenes_answer3: Ngaphambi kokuphothula noma iyiphi inkokhelo, qiniseka ukuthi ubuyekeza yonke imininingwane yokuthenga.
fraudawarenes_answer4: Qiniseka, i-PayCio ayisoze yakuthumela isicelo semininingwane ebucayi.
fraudawarenes_answer5: Kwenze umkhuba ukuhlola umlando we-akhawunti yakho ye-PayCio nganoma yikuphi ukuthenga okungajwayelekile noma okungagunyaziwe.
ucpisection_header: I-Crypto Payments interface (i-UCPI) i-interface eyingqayizivele yokuthi i-PayCio ithuthukise ukunika amandla ukuthengiselana okungenamandla.
ucpisection_line: Ngosizo lwayo, abasebenzisi bangashintshanisa ama-cryptocurrencies amaningi ngaphakathi kwepulatifomu eyodwa.
ucpisection_uniqline: I-PayCio ayigcini ngokukhokhela izinkokhelo ze-crypto kuphela.
ucpisection_line2: Ipulatifomu yethu isiza inqubo yokuqinisekisa e-KYC.
ucpisection_line3: Ngethuluzi lethu, uthola ukufinyelela ezintweni ezinjengokukhokha okulula kwe-crypto, ukuthengiselana kontanga, ukuhlela inkokhelo, nokudluliswa kwenani le-cross-chain yenani.
ucpisection_line4: I-PayCio yakha isixazululo esihlanganisiwe sokubhekana nenkinga yezinsizakalo ze-crypto ezihlangene futhi ithuthukise isipiliyoni somsebenzisi esiphelele, kufaka phakathi izixazululo ze-C2C, B2B, kanye ne-B2C yabathengisi.
ucpisection_needline: Cabanga ukuthi unenqwaba yama-wallets wezimali ezahlukahlukene - ama-rupees, amadola, ama-ruble, nokuningi.
ucpisection_needline1: Sibhekana nokuphazamiseka kokuzulazula ama-wallets amaningi, ama-blockchains, izinsizakalo kanye nokushintshana.
ucpisection_needline2: I-PayCio yenza lula izinkokhelo ze-crypto ukwenza ngcono ukwamukelwa ngobuningi be-blockchain technologies.
ucpisection_needline3: Sisiza izinqubo ze-KYC ukusiza abasebenzisi ukuthi badlule ngokushesha ubunikazi ngenkathi kulandela izidingo zokulawula kanye nokukhuthaza ukwethenjwa.
ucpisection_needline4: Ithuluzi lethu likhulisa amakhono okukhokha futhi lenza lonke inqubo yonke iguqulwe ngamabhizinisi nabantu.
ucpisection_participantsline1: Ipulatifomu yethu ilungele amaqembu amaningi ahlukene amakhasimende, anjengokuthi:
ucpisection_partheader1: Amabhizinisi angahlanganisa ithuluzi lokukhokha le-crypto ezinqubweni zawo
ucpisection_partheader3: Abalawuli abathola isisombululo esilula sokuhlolwa kokutholwa kokulandela
ucpisection_partheader4: Abasebenzisi bokugcina abatshala imali eCrypto noma bafuna ukusebenzisa izimpahla zabo zedijithali ngenkathi bethenga
ucpibenefits_line1: Ngenxa yokuthengiselana kwe-crypto, i-UCPI inamandla okuqoqwa kwentela ephezulu.
ucpibenefits_line2: Ubuchwepheshe bethu buhlinzeka ngezigaba ezingenasisekelo zezakhamizi ngezinsizakalo zezezimali ngokuqinisekiswa kobunikazi obulula.
ucpibenefits_line3: Sakha i-crypto ecosystem echumayo, eheha abatshalizimali nabasunguli abavela kuwo wonke umhlaba.
ucpibenefits_line4: I-UCPI inika amandla ukubhekwa okusebenzayo kokuthengiselana kwe-Crypto, ekhuluma nezinto ezikhathazayo zokulawula ngemisebenzi engekho emthethweni.
ucpibenefits_insightsline: I-UCPI isebenza njengebhuloho elixhuma amabhlogo ahlukene epulatifomu eyodwa, okwenza ukusetshenziswa kwe-crypto kube lula, ngokushesha, futhi kuphephe kakhulu.
ucpibenefits_insightsline1: Izinselelo ze-UCPI ziphonsela inselelo yokuxolelwa kwendabuko ngokwenza lula izinkokhelo zomngcele kanye nokunciphisa izindleko.
ucpibenefits_insightsline2: Njengepulatifomu yokukhokha ye-P2P yomhlaba wonke, i-PayCio isekela izinhlobo eziningi zezimali ze-Fiat.
ucpibenefits_insightsline3: I-UCPI ihlose ukuphazamisa izinhlelo zokukhokha zendabuko ngokunikeza enye indlela esheshayo, eshisiwe futhi ephephe ngokwengeziwe.

termsconditions_line2: Le migomo nemibandela ('imigomo') ilawula ukusetshenziswa kwakho kwe-Paycio Cryptocurrency Services ('Services').
termsconditions_line4: Uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-PayCio lwenza lula inqubo yokudlulisela imali usebenzisa inombolo yeselula, inika amandla ukuthengiselana okulula ngempompo elula kudivayisi yakho yeselula.
termsconditions_line5: Emgogodleni wesipiliyoni se-PayCio yiyona ehlanganayo ye-Crypto Inkokhelo ekhokhwayo (UCPI).
termsconditions_line6: I-UCPI isebenzisa umzila wempahla yedijithali yedijithali, ukusekela ikhasimende-kuya-ikhasimende (C2C), ibhizinisi-to-Business (B2B), kanye nokusebenzisana kwebhizinisi (B2C).
termsconditions_line7: Ngokufaka i-UCPI, i-PayCio iqinisekisa hhayi nje kuphela umzila wempahla yedijithali kodwa futhi ephephile yokukhokhelwa komthengisi kanye nokuqinisekiswa komazisi ngezinombolo zeselula.
termsconditions_line10: Ngenxa yemvelo eguqukayo yemakethe ye-cryptocurrency, seluleka abathengi ukuthi baqonde ngokugcwele izingozi ezihilelekile.
termsconditions_line12: Le migomo yokusebenzisa yomthengisi ('Imigomo') ilawula ukusetshenziswa kwakho kwemikhiqizo ye-PayCio, izinsizakalo, nanoma yiziphi ezinye izici ezihlobene nezinsizakalo zokwamukelwa kwenkokhelo yomthengisi (Izinsizakalo zokwamukela ').
termsconditions_line13: Ngokusebenzisa izinsizakalo zokwamukelwa ngewebhusayithi ye-PayCio, i-API, noma enye enye indlela, wena ('Merchant', 'wena' noma 'wakho') uyavuma ukuthi uboshwe yile migomo.
termsconditions_line15: I-PayCio inamathela kuyo yonke imithetho nemithetho esebenzayo yase-US, kufaka phakathi umthetho wokugcina ama-Bankicrecy, izinhlelo zezomnotho nezohwebo ezilawulwa nguMnyango Wezezimali wase-US wehhovisi lempahla yakwaMgcinimafa Yezimpahla Zamafasitela alawulwa (AML) kanye nemithetho yezezimali elwa namaphekula.
termsconditions_line16: I-PayCio yibhizinisi lenkonzo yemali ebhalisiwe eline-Crimes Exforment Exporimes (FICCEN) yoMnyango Wezezimali wase-United States Okwesiko futhi unamalayisense njenge-Transmitter yemali lapho kutholakala khona ilayisense.
termsconditions_line17: Ngokwengeziwe, i-PayCio ihambisana nemigomo yesiDashi ne-EU, kufaka phakathi umthetho waseDashi ekuvinjelweni kokusebenzisa imali kanye nokuxhaswa ngezimali kobuphekula ('WWFT') kanye noMthetho Wezinhlangano ZaseDashi
termsconditions_line19: Ngokusebenzisa izinsizakalo zika-PayCio, uyavuma ukuthobela le migomo neminye imithetho noma imithetho esebenzayo.

privacypolicy_line99: Amarekhodi emikhiqizo noma izinsizakalo ezithengiwe, ezitholakele, noma ezibhekwe, kanye nokuthenga noma umlando wokusebenzisa.
privacypolicy_line101: Imininingwane yokuphequlula umlando, umlando wokusesha, kanye nokuxhumana namawebhusayithi, izinhlelo zokusebenza, noma izikhangiso kwi-Intanethi.
privacypolicy_line102: Abahlali baseCalifornia banamalungelo athile ahlobene nemininingwane yabo yangasese ngaphansi kwe-CCPA.
privacypolicy_line104: Ukuze uthuthukise ukuphepha kwe-akhawunti yakho, i-PayCio idinga ukufinyelela kumakhono wefoni wakho wefoni ukuqinisekiswa kwenombolo yeselula.
privacypolicy_line105: Sifuna ukukuqinisekisa ukuthi le mvume izosetshenziselwa kuphela ukuqinisekisa inombolo yakho yeselula futhi uqinisekise ukuphepha kwe-akhawunti yakho.
privacypolicy_line107: Ngaphezu kwezinhloso ezichazwe kule Nqubomgomo Yobumfihlo, i-PayCio ingasebenzisa imininingwane yomuntu eqoqwe kubahlali baseCalifornia ngezinhloso zebhizinisi ezilandelayo:
privacypolicy_line109: I-PayCio ingaqhuba ama-aughties futhi ikhiqize imibiko ngokuthengiselana okuthile nokusebenzisana, kufaka phakathi ukusebenzisana oku-inthanethi onakho nge-PayCio noma abantu besithathu abasebenzelana nathi.
privacypolicy_line111: Imininingwane yomuntu siqu ingahle isetshenziselwe ukuthola nokuvikela izinsongo zokuphepha, imisebenzi yenkohliso, nezinye izenzo ezingekho emthethweni.
privacypolicy_line112: Futhi singasebenzisa imininingwane yomuntu siqu kwezinye izinhloso zokusebenza ezihlobene nezinsizakalo ze-PayCio noma zalabo abahlinzeki bemisebenzi yethu.
privacypolicy_line113: Ukuthengisa, Ukwabelana, Nokudalulwa Kwemininingwane Yakho YaseCalifornia & US
privacypolicy_line114: Ngaphansi komthetho wobumfihlo weCalifornia Consumer Consumer Act (CCPA), 'Ukuthengisa' kubhekiswa ekushintshisaneni kwemininingwane yomuntu siqu yemali noma isinxephezelo esibalulekile.
privacypolicy_line115: I-PayCio ingadalula imininingwane yomuntu uqobo kubamukeli abalandelayo ngezinhloso zebhizinisi:
privacypolicy_line1161: Ukwabelana ngolwazi lomuntu siqu phakathi kwezinkampani ezihambisana nazo.
privacypolicy_line1171: Imininingwane ingabiwa nabahlinzeki bemisebenzi yeqembu lesithathu abasiza i-paycio ekusebenzeni kwebhizinisi.

privacypolicy_line1191: Singadalula imininingwane yomuntu ku-Law, izikhulu zikahulumeni, noma abanye abantu besithathu ukuphendula ama-supoenas, ama-oda enkantolo, noma ezinye izidingo zomthetho.
privacypolicy_line1201: Imininingwane yomuntu siqu ingabiwa nabathengisi ezimweni zokukhohlisa noma ukuphenya okuqhubekayo.
privacypolicy_line121: I-PayCio ayiqoqi, ithengise, noma idalule imininingwane yomuntu siqu yabasebenzisi abangaphansi kweminyaka engu-16. Ngaphezu kwalokho, sisebenzisa kuphela imininingwane yomuntu siqu ebucayi njengoba kuvunyelwe yi-CCPA.

faqpagetext_line30: I-KYC (Yazi Ikhasimende Lakho) Isinyathelo sokuphepha esisiza ukuvikela i-akhawunti yakho kusuka enkohlisweni, kuqinisekisa ukuthi silandela imithetho yezomthetho, futhi senze ukuthengiselana kwakho kuphephe futhi kuvikeleke.
faqpagetext_line32: Ungaqinisekisa inombolo yakho yeselula kwenye yalezi zindlela ezi-3:
faqpagetext_line36: Iphasiwedi yesikhathi esisodwa izothunyelwa kwifoni yakho (Qaphela: I-SIM ebhalisiwe kufanele ibe lapho kuselula).

faqpagetext_line45: Kwabasebenzisi bamazwe aphesheya, inqubo ivame ukuthatha imizuzu emi-2-3, kuya ngedokhumenti oyilayishayo ukuze iqinisekiswe umazisi.
faqpagetext_line47: Ukushintsha iPIN yakho yezokuphepha, landela lezi zinyathelo:
faqpagetext_line61: Faka iPIN yakho yamanje ukuze uqinisekise ubunikazi bakho.

faqpagetext_line92: Ngabe i-paycio ithumela isiqinisekiso lapho izinkokhelo zenziwa ngokungaxhunyiwe kwi-inthanethi?

faqpagetext_line103: Imali ehlukile yegesi iyisici esiyingqayizivele se-PayCio, okuvumela ukuthi ukhokhe imali yokuthenga usebenzisa noma iyiphi enye imali oyikhethile.

faqpagetext_line105: Cha, azikho izimali ezifihliwe kunoma yikuphi ukuthengiselana ku-PayCio.

faqpagetext_line117: Ingabe kukhona imali ekhokhwayo esetshenziselwe ukuhlanganiswa kwe-UCPI?
faqpagetext_line118: Okwamanje, akukho zimali ezisetshenziselwa ukuhlanganiswa kwe-UCPI.
faqpagetext_line119: Ngabe yimiphi imibhalo edingekayo ekuhlanganisweni kwe-UCPI?
faqpagetext_line120: Yebo, amadokhumenti abalulekile ayadingeka ukuze aqinisekiswe.
faqpagetext_line122: Yebo, sinikezela ngosizo kuyo yonke inqubo yokuhlanganiswa kwe-UCPI ukuqinisekisa okuhlangenwe nakho okubushelelezi nokunobungozi.
ucpipagetext_line1: Izwa isixazululo sokukhokha esilandelayo se-Gen Crypto.
ucpipagetext_line2: I-Unefied Crypto Inkokhelo I-Interface (i-UCPI) iyipulatifomu esekelwe e-blockchain ethuthukisiwe ehlanganisa ama-cryptocurrency ama-wallets kanye nezinsizakalo ze-Fiat Banking ze-Web3 ezinikelwe ngoFiat Banking zibe uhlelo lokusebenza olusebenziseka kalula.
ucpipagetext_line4: Ngokuhlanganisa ama-akhawunti we-Crypto ngezinsizakalo ze-Fiat Banking, i-UCPI ivumela abathengisi nabasebenzisi ukuthi bathenge, bathengise, futhi baphathe ama-cryptocurrencies eceleni kwezimali zendabuko ngaphandle kokuhlupheka.
ucpipagetext_line5: I-UCPI ye-PayCio yenza lula ukukhokha kwe-crypto kuwo wonke umuntu
ucpipagetext_line7: I-UCPI inika abasebenzisi abasebenzisi ngaphandle komthungeli basebenzise i-cryptocurrenrenrecrencrencrencrencrenction ezimpahleni nasezinsizakalweni emhlabeni jikelele ngokusebenzisa i-ecosystem ephephile futhi elula efinyeleleka ku-Android ne-iOS.
ucpipagetext_line9: I-UCPI iyipulatifomu eguqukayo eyenzelwe ukwenziwa kabusha isimo sezezimali emhlabeni.
ucpipagetext_line11: Ngombono wayo wokusungula ukuthengiselana kwezezimali, i-UCPI isethwe ukuba ngumguquki womdlalo ezinkokhelo ze-Crypto.
ucpipagetext_line12: Izindlela zokuphepha ezinamandla zika-UCPI zokuthengiselana okuphephile kwe-Crypto
ucpipagetext_line13: Ukusheshisa ukuthuthukiswa nge-UCPI's Versatile API Ukuhlanganiswa
ucpipagetext_line14: Izisombululo zokuhlanganiswa kwe-UCPI API yawo wonke amabhizinisi
ucpipagetext_line15: Bheka lapha ukuze uhlanganise i-UCPI's Crypto Reclosces Excerly Ngokusebenza Ngokuzikhandla.
ucpipagetext_line17: I-UCPI inikeza iphrofayili ye-crypto enobunye, ihlanganisa zonke izimpahla zakho ze-crypto ibe yiplatifomu eyodwa evikelekile, elula ukuphatha.
ucpipagetext_line19: Sisebenzisa ukubethela kwakamuva kwe-TLS, AES, kanye ne-PKI ukugcina idatha yakho iphephile futhi iphephile ngenkathi uyithumela nge-Intanethi.
ucpipagetext_line21: Ama-wallet angewona ama-PayCio angagcini akuvumela ukuthi ugcine ukulawula izinkinobho zakho eziyimfihlo, ukuvikela izimpahla zakho ze-crypto ngaphandle kokuncika kunoma yibaphi abantu besithathu.
ucpipagetext_line23: I-UCPI isebenzisa ukubethela okuphezulu kwe-notch ukuvikela ama-eavesdropping, ukugcina ukuthengiselana kwakho kwe-crypto kuphephile emehlweni e-Prity.
ucpipagetext_line25: I-UCPI ivikela idatha yakho ye-crypto nge-End-to-End Encryption, uqiniseke ukuthi akekho umuntu ongavumelanisa imininingwane yakho ebucayi.
trsutsafety_line2: Sibeka phambili ubumfihlo bemininingwane yakho yangasese futhi siqinisekise ukuthi ihanjiswa ngokuphephile.
mediakit_linetext: Landela le mihlahlandlela ukuze uqinisekise ukuvumelana kanye nokunemba lapho ukhuthaza i-PayCio ekukhangiseni ukuxhumana, kufaka phakathi ukukhangisa, izindatshana, amawebhusayithi, nezinto zokwakha eziphrintiwe.
mediakit_line2: Ngesethi ephelele yemihlahlandlela yomkhiqizo, sicela ubheke imihlahlandlela yomkhiqizo we-paycio.
mediakit_line7: Udinga ukufaka umkhiqizo we-paycio ekuxhumaneni kwakho?
mediakit_line9: Thola ikhophi yefonti yethu yenkampani, e-ERAS BOLD ITC.

homesection_helpyou_header3: Ngabe inkampani yami idinga usizo lwezeluleko zokukhangisa?
homesection_helpyou_content3: Ngaphambi kokuphothula noma iyiphi inkokhelo, qiniseka ukuthi ubuyekeza yonke imininingwane yokuthenga.
businesssection_text: Yemukela izinkokhelo zomhlaba wonke ngokungasebenzi ngezimali eziningi nge-paycio.
businesssection_whychoose_desc1: Nweba ibhizinisi lakho ngokuthengiselana kwemali yedijithali.
businesssection_whychoose_desc2: Finyelela amakhasimende emhlabeni wonke ngezinkokhelo zomngcele we-Seamless.
businesssection_whychoose_desc3: Vikela konke ukukhokha ngokubethela okuthuthukile nokuvimbela inkohliso.
businesssection_hassless: Izixazululo eyodwa yazo zonke izinkinga zakho zokukhokha
businesssection_hassless_text: Sakaza izinkokhelo zakho kalula - okusheshayo, okuphephile, nokungenakuhlupheka kwendawo endaweni eyodwa.
businesssection_supportsvalue1: Hambisa ku-Web3 kalula ngezixazululo zethu, eklanyelwe ukukhulisa ibhizinisi lakho ngaphandle kokushintsha lokho abasebenzisi bakho abakuthandayo.
businesssection_supportsvalue2: Indlela ephephile futhi elula yokuxhuma ibhizinisi lakho kuzo zombili izinhlelo ze-Crypto naseFiat, okwenza izinkokhelo zilula kuwo wonke umuntu.
businesssection_supportsvalue3: Sisiza imidlalo yakho yokudlala ukuze ifinyelele ekufinyeleleni amandla abo aphelele ngaphandle kokuphazamisa ubumnandi.
businesssection_securitydesc1: Thumela futhi uthole izinkokhelo ze-Crypto ngesikhathi sangempela ngendlela esheshayo nephephile
businesssection_securitydesc2: Xhuma kalula ama-wallets akho we-crypto nge-paycio ngokuthengiselana okuphephile nokungasebenzi.
businesssection_securitydesc3: Gcina izindleko lapho uthumela izinkokhelo ze-Crypto ngezindlela zethu zokuhambisa impahla ezinomthungo.
businesssection_securitydesc4: Thumela futhi wamukele izinkokhelo kuma-cryptocurrencrencries amaningi, ukukhetha kusuka kukhetho lwama-50 +.
businesssection_securitydesc5: Jabulela ukuqinisekiswa kokuthengwa okuseduze lapho wenza izinkokhelo.
businesssection_customersupport_text: Iqembu lethu lilapha ukukunikeza ukwesekwa komuntu uqobo ngaphakathi kwehora elitholakala ngo-24/7.
testimonial_1_content: Ukubaluleka kwethu e-Innoggobal kuhlale kuhlangenwe nakho kwamakhasimende.
testimonial_2_content: I-PAYCIO Enye I-PAYCIO Enye Imodeli Yezimali Yegesi Yomqondo Othuthukile kakhulu.
testimonial_3_content: Ukubonakala kukaPayCio ngenqubomgomo yezimali 'yazo' ayikho ezihlaselayo
testimonial_4_content: Sithola ukusebenza kwe-PAYCIO's QR Code Scan ewusizo kakhulu.
testimonial_5_content: Amasu ethu okuthengisa agxile ekwakheni ubudlelwane obuhlala isikhathi eside.
